title: His Biggest Fan
description: Kenny can't concentrate on the big race because he feels guilty. The night before, he asked his father not to come. Will Kenny win the race, and will his father show up? Students will enjoy the detailed illustrations that support the text as well as reading about interesting character relationships.
highFrequencyWords: accelerated, argument, concentrate, hesitate, nervous, qualify, regret, sprints, stride
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
